handleEvent

public void handleEvent(LoggedOn event)
Description copied from class: SubspaceBot
Request this event from EventRequester and override this method in your bot to handle this event (packet). If you request this event and do not handle it, the default behavior defined here will be executed. If you attempt to handle the event without requesting it from EventRequester, it will not be handled.

Overrides:
handleEvent in class SubspaceBot

event - Event object of handled event (packet)

handleDisconnect

public void handleDisconnect()
Description copied from class: SubspaceBot
Default disconnection behavior (do nothing). This method is called from Session's disconnect() when the bot has been asked to die. Override this method to include custom disconnection behavior. It is recommended if your bot makes any connections to outside sources that may be left open after the bot dies, that they be closed using this method.

Overrides:
handleDisconnect in class SubspaceBot
